body.description: Mario Badescu Facial Spray Rosewater and Lavender Duo This duo features two of our most beloved mists: A Facial Spray with Aloe, Herbs and Rosewater, the cult-favorite facial spray that re-energizes dehydrated skin with a dewy glow. A Facial Spray with Aloe, Chamomile and Lavender, the face mist that replenishes skin with an infusion of calming botanicals and Lavender Essential Water—leaving the complexion balanced and bright. SKIN TYPE Ideal for all skin types

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Mario Badescu Facial Spray Rosewater and Lavender Duo This duo features two of our most beloved mists: A Facial Spray with Aloe, Herbs and Rosewater, the cult-favorite facial spray that re-energizes dehydrated skin with a dewy glow. A Facial Spray with Aloe, Chamomile and Lavender, the face mist that replenishes skin with an infusion of calming botanicals and Lavender Essential Water—leaving the complexion balanced and bright. SKIN TYPE Ideal for all skin types Benefits Aloe Vera delivers light soothing hydration Bladderwrack softens and nourishes Vitamin C antioxidant combats skin-aging free radicals leaving the skin balanced and bright Thyme Boasts Natural Clarifying Properties

HOW TO USE Mist onto face, neck, or hair as needed. Use it to: Infuse more hydration before applying moisturizer. As a pick-me-up on the go—whenever, wherever. Post-makeup application to give skin a dewy finish. Dampen makeup brushes or sponges to infuse skin care benefits into your makeup. If product gets into eyes, rinse well with water. #MBSKINTIP To give your makeup a dewy finish, spritz your favorite brush or sponge before blending in foundation or concealer. Once you're done, mist your face as a final step to add radiance. For an extra refreshing and cooling boost, store the bottle in your refrigerator. WHY WE LOVE IT Replenishes skin with an infusion of calming botanicals and Lavender Essential Water. VEGAN. OIL-FREE. PARABEN-FREE. GLUTEN-FREE & SULFATE FREE.

Mario Badescu Facial Spray with Aloe, Chamomile and Lavender Mario Badescu Facial Spray with Aloe, Chamomile and Lavender Mario Badescu Facial Spray with Aloe, Sage and Orange Blossom Mario Badescu Facial Spray with Aloe, Cucumber and Green Tea What It Does A facial spray that replenishes skin with a soothing boost of hydration A trio that include 3 Mario Badescu facial sprays so you have a mist for every mood An uplifting blend of purifying botanicals and orange Blossom Essential Water that helps replenish and revive dull, tired skin An invigorating facial mist that hydrates and wakes up tired skin Key Ingredients Thyme, Bladderwrack, Lavender, Chamomile Aloevera, Bladderwrack, Chamomile, Lavender, Gardenia & Rose Thyme, Cucumber Essential Water Peppermint Essential Water, Green Tea Aloe vera, Bladderwrack, Sage Essential Water and Extract, Orange Blossom Essential Water Aloevera, Bladderwrack, Cucumber Essential Water Peppermint Essential Water, Green Tea

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I don’t care that these were trendy for a hot minute and aren’t so much these days, I still swear by them! I have the green tea for waking up, the lavender for bed, and the rose water for any time of day. These are best for use right before a serum, as they gently wet the skin and help lock-in extra moisture without adding oil or clogging pores. They’re packaged well for shipping, inexpensive, nicely scented, use quality ingredients, and add some affordable luxury to your skincare routine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the lavender
reviews.reviewText: I keep one in my purse and one at home by the bed. All the women at work like to share to spritz up our faces and energy levels at work. I use a lot of lavender oil at home, but the spritz is great for the face on the go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect & Delicate Facial Sprays! Most Wonderful in all ways!
reviews.reviewText: All three Facial Sprays by Mario Badescue are wonderfully soothing and soft on the face. And they are perfect for the heat of summer - I put them in the refrigerator in the summer, and then take one with me, to spray and revive me, during the acute heat and humidity of summer. Their scent is so delicate and refreshing - a truly perfect facial spray and spirit reviver. Thank you AMAZON for carrying these perfect and reasonably priced facial sprays! And hot weather reviver! I will never live without them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great product, but spilled in delivery
reviews.reviewText: Loved the rose pray so ordered more, but arrived in zipped bag wet from spilled product. I use this everyday and didn’t want to wait for more, but little sad. One of these bottles lasts me ages and so good to just throw in bag! ESP for me, I have adhd, one rose spritz and I’m refreshed and more focused

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this mist!
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE LOVE this mist on my dry days! Sprit this on and I love it! 🥰😍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful moisturizer spray
reviews.reviewText: I absolutly LOVE this spray. It refreshes my face on these hot summer days. I use it under my moisturizer for added moister. A great value for a great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love this product and the whole idea of a facial mist. Have both my daughters hooked on it as well. Live in the desert, so in the summer there is always one in the fridge for when I need a pick me up from the awful heat. Always spritz before applying my moisturizer, as that give my lotion some moisture to seal in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Rose is Nice, Lavender Not So Much
reviews.reviewText: My skincare routine is super simple. I don't wash my face (not even with water!). I don't use moisturizer, toner, serums, creams, or anything else. I don't wear makeup. All I use is this facial spray, because it's great for cooling off in the summer and I love the smell of roses. That said, the rose scent is nice, subtle, floral, fresh. The lavender scent is oddly medicinal and a little icky smelling. Maybe it's the chamomile? My husband can always tell when I put it on, even he thinks it smells a little off. If I buy this again, I will only purchase the rose scent.

Son muy refrescantes, la botella bonita, tengo piel sensible y la verdad el producto es muy bueno no irrita nada. Lo traigo en la bolsa y me rocío durante el día, sientes como absorbe la grasa o suciedad de la cara y refresca.
Lo que más me gustó es le precio, muy buena oferta
Llegaron en buen estado, me encantan como dejan la piel super suave. Es una buena opción como tónico. El de rosas lo uso por el día y el de lavanda por la noche

La de lavanda es lo máximo... deja la piel fresca, con una ligera capa (como mascarilla). La uso por las noches y dejo que seque un poco. Esta marca es buenísima, cero pretensiones con el etiquetado que también está padre por directo y sencillo. Muy recomendable.
